name: Kidde Pro 210 2A:10-B:C Fire Extinguisher, Rechargeable, Multi-Purpose for Home & Office, 4 lbs., Mounting Bracket Included , Red
short_description: Use to fight basic fires common to the home & office: involving trash, wood, paper (Class A), flammable liquids and gases (Class B), and electrical equipment (Class C)
Lightweight: Durable, corrosion-resistant aluminum cylinder with mounting bracket included
Easy to read pressure gauge tells you when the fire extinguisher is charged & ready for use
Tough, aluminum valve assembly, rust and impact resistant handle, & easy to pull safety pin
4 pounds of monoammonium phosphate fire-fighting agent in the cylinder; see a professional for recharging after use
Clear instruction label: shows the steps required to operate the fire extinguisher & includes a bilingual nameplate
UL-approved wall hanger for safe, easy mounting & storage
Quick and powerful: Discharge time of 13 to 15 seconds, a discharge range of 10 to 15 feet & operating pressure of 100 PSI
product_description: Keep your home and family safe with the Kidde Pro 210 2A:10-B:C Fire Extinguisher, Rechargeable, Multi-Purpose for Home & Office designed to fight basic fires common to the home or office including those involving trash, wood, paper (Class A), liquids and gases (Class B), and electrical equipment (Class C). The Kidde ABC fire extinguisher has a tough, aluminum valve assembly, rust and impact-resistant handle, easy-to-pull safety pin and is fitted with a pressure indicator that is easy to read. Manufactured from lightweight aluminum, and weighing 7.5 lbs., the Kidde rechargeable fire extinguisher is easy to handle and is quick and powerful with a discharge time of 13-15 seconds, a discharge range of 10-15 feet, and an operating pressure of 100 PSI. Four pounds of monoammonium phosphate fire-fighting agent in the cylinder; see a professional for recharging after use. The clear instruction label on the front shows the steps required for operation and includes a bilingual nameplate. On the outside of this small fire extinguisher, you'll find a clear instruction label that shows the steps to follow to put out a fire using the PASS guide: pull the pin, aim at the base of the fire, squeeze the lever and handle, and sweep from side to side. Aluminum valve assembly, UL-approved wall hanger and extended hose are included. Single-use only. UL rated. 10-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Note that the dry chemical agent in this ABC fire extinguisher is non-toxic but may cause skin irritation.

product_description: Amerex 5 Pound Carbon Dioxide Fire Extinguisher with wall mount bracket operates effectively at the temperature range of -22 to 120 deg F. Electrically non-conductive fire extinguisher featuring all metal valve construction is effective for class B flammable liquids.

name: Amerex B500, 5lb ABC Dry Chemical Fire Extinguisher with Aluminum Valve
short_description: 6-year warranty
Stored pressure design
Durable high gloss polyester powder paint
All-metal valve construction
product_description: The Amerex B500 ABC or multi-purpose extinguisher utilizes a specially fluidized and siliconized mono ammonium phosphate dry chemical. It chemically insulates Class A fires by melting at approximately 350° F and coats surface to which it is applied. It smothers and breaks the chain reaction of Class B fires and will not conduct electricity back to the operator.

name: Kidde Fire Extinguisher for Boats, Single-Use 5BC
short_description: Combats Marine Fires: Stop basic fires common to boats: flammable liquids and gases (Class B) & electrical equipment (Class C)
12X More Corrosion Resistance*: Engineered using durable aluminum and stainless steel components
All-Metal Construction: Metal valve assembly, rust, and impact-resistant stainless-steel lever & easy pull safety pin
Easy-to-Read Pressure Indicator: If arrow is in the green it’s charged
Quick and Powerful: Discharge time of 8-12 seconds, a discharge range of 6-8 feet
US Coast Guard (USCG) approved, with UL-approved plastic strap bracket (included)
UL Listed and has a 12-year limited manufacturer warranty
2 lbs. of sodium bicarbonate fighting agent
Scan QR Code: Provides quick access to online registration, warranty, and product info
product_description: Discover reliable fire safety with the Kidde Fire Extinguisher for Boats, Single-Use 5-B:C, designed to contain basic fires on watercrafts involving flammable liquids and gases (Class B), and electrical equipment (Class C). The simple & reliable operation is designed to combat fire hazards using the PASS (Pull, Aim, Squeeze, Sweep) firefighting method to fight fire from 6 to 8 feet. Constructed from lightweight, durable corrosion-resistant aluminum with stainless-steel lever and fitted with an easy-to-read pressure indicator, the heavy-duty valve assembly is made for years of service. The strap bracket lets you mount the extinguisher in an easily accessible place so it’s always ready for an emergency. The easy-to-pull safety pin gives you quick access. Single use only. Available for use for consumer marine and light commercial boat applications. Dispose & replace if used, discharged, or if the fire extinguisher is over 12 years old. UL Listed. 12-year limited manufacturer's warranty. Note that the dry chemical agent in this fire extinguisher is non-toxic and won’t damage metal surfaces but may cause skin irritation. Recreational boats over 26 feet may require more than one Kidde fire extinguisher. *Compared to industry saltwater test standards.

product_description: ABC or Multi-Purpose extinguishers utilize a specially fluidized and siliconized mono ammonium phosphate dry chemical. It chemically insulates Class A fires by melting at approximately 350°F and coats surface to which it is applied. It smothers and breaks the chain reaction of Class B fires and will not conduct electricity back to the operator. For Use on Class A (ordinary combustibles), Class B (flammable liquid) spills, and Class C (fires involving live electrical equipment).

name: 2 Pack Fire Extinguisher Brackets- 5 LB Fire Extinguisher Wall Mount Bracket- Metal Heavy Duty Fire Extinguisher Holder for Home, Car, RV, Truck, Mini Fire Extinguishers (Non-Universal)
short_description: Strong load bearing: You will receive 2 pcs replacement fire extinguisher brackets, the load-bearing capacity is 5 lbs, The maximum diameter of the strap closure is 4.7 inch, before purchasing, please confirm the size of our bracket and the size of your fire extinguisher to avoid mismatch.

Easy to install: Contains all the components needed for installation, 8 corresponding screws and black gaskets, so that you can be installed on the wall in a few minutes, saving you time and effort, so that you can use the fire extinguisher quickly and easily.
Quick release clasp: This fire extinguisher wall mount holder comes with a quick release clasp, in case of emergency, just open the button and pull the fire extinguisher for fast access.
Quality material: Our fire extinguisher mount brackets are made of steel and iron, and can withstand the weight of a fire extinguisher, sturdy and not easy to be damaged, with a long service life.
Widely used: The fire extinguisher metal bracket can be used in homes, warehouses, offices, stores, cars, trucks, factories, ships, etc., to escort your safety.
